name: LagOut Framework for Construct 2
description:
Hello! Today I present to you LagOut Framework for Construct 2!
This framework will allow you to effortlessly make a game with awesome advanced movement such as:

[Basic movement]
Running, Jumping etc.

[Advanced movement]
Wall-jumping
Rolling on floor
Ducking mid-air
Roll-landing

Please refer to the demo version above, if you have any questions.
If you decide to buy the framework, the .capx file is yours!

----- License -----
You are free to:

- Use the framework for commercial and non-commercial purposes, provided you have bought it on this page or obtained it legitimately via other means.

- Remix and transform the framework in any way you wish to suit your needs and/or your game.

You are not allowed to:

- Redistribute the framework itself, even with minor changes, and/or claim it as your own work.

Notice: The player sprites will differ in the downloaded file, that's because they are from a paid asset pack, and the author prohibits redistributing the files. As I respect the author's decision, the player sprites were changed in the downloadable .capx.
